Address: 4TH FLOOR, PRESIDENT PLACE CNR. JAN SMUTS & BOLTON, ROSEBANK, JOHANNESBURG, 00000, South Africa
CompanyDescription: We are a leading provider of financial technology, or fintech, products and services to the unbanked and underbanked in a number of emerging and developed economies. In emerging economies these customers are typically individuals, while in developed countries, they are primarily small businesses. We have developed and own most of our payment technologies, and where possible, utilize this technology to provide financial and value-added services to our customers by including them into the formal financial system.  ...
